sections.heading: Costs; county not liable; exception
sections.text: No costs shall be paid from the county treasury in any case of prosecution for a misdemeanor except as provided in section 29-2709.SourceG.S.1873, c. 58, § 535, p. 840;R.S.1913, § 9239;C.S.1922, § 10268;C.S.1929, § 29-2703;R.S.1943, § 29-2703;Laws 1965, c. 125, §
